about_the_game:
In the 'Abandoned Town' series, a man-made environmental disaster has transformed a once quaint town into a ghost town. With the Abandoned Town: Farmhouse episode DLC, you can explore an abandoned farmhouse where the contents still remain but people are nowhere to be found. You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

This episode includes a hidden objects game--rummage through the house to discover left-behind belongings. It also includes the Secret Items game.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collectors Expansion 2020/2021

You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting and they'll cycle through automatically.

This episode includes a hidden objects game--rummage through the house to discover left-behind belongings. It also includes the Secret Items game.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collectors Expansion 2020/2021

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650Ti or AMD R7 260

short_description: In the 'Abandoned Town' series, a man-made environmental disaster has transformed a once quaint town into a ghost town. In the 'Farmhouse' episode you explore an abandoned farmhouse where the contents still remain but the people are long gone. Discover family belongings in the hidden objects game.
